titleStmt.title: A new disputation betweene the two lordly bishops, Yorke and Canterbvry. With a discourse of many passages which have happened to them before and since that they were committed to the Towe of London. Being very necessary for observation and well worth the reading. / Written in English prose by L.P. February the second, 1642.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

notesStmt.note: Woodcut portrait of the Bishop of Canterbury on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
